summary: Architect Paul Thomas insinuates himself into the relationship of two bisexual women living in a St. Tropez villa with tragic consequences.
cast: Jean-Louis Trintignant|Jacqueline Sassard|Stéphane Audran|Nane Germon|Serge Bento|Henri Frances|Henri Attal|Dominique Zardi|Laure Valmée|Claude Chabrol
keywords: bisexual|lesbianism|menage a trois|lesbian|woman murders a woman
title: Las ciervas
